    • IKC

    Continuing their success and demonstrating their unparalleled potential, the team made an outstanding and remarkable debut at the esteemed national level Go-kart design and fabrication event, GKDC 2018, showcasing their brilliance and tenacity, and secured a highly impressive and commendable All-India Rank of 27 out of an impressive pool of 190 participants, making their mark in the fiercely competitive field of motorsports.

    QUAD TORC

    Marking yet another chapter in their illustrious journey, the team introduced the innovative Quad Torc Concept in 2020, governing the widespread acclaim and securing the coveted overall runners-up position, a testament to their commitment to pushing the boundaries of innovation and engineering. Additionally, they received the highly prestigious and well-deserved Best Captain Award, recognizing the exemplary leadership that steered the team to unparalleled heights.

    AUTONOMUS E-JEEP

    EFFI CAR

    Embarking on their exhilarating journey, the team achieved a significant and noteworthy milestone by emerging victorious and being bestowed with the esteemed Best Design Award in the highly acclaimed EFFI electric car competition of 2016, a competition that showcased the cutting-edge innovations in the realm of electric vehicles.
